Improvements.Description: System.err.println statements are not suitable for production code. They are not flexible in terms of output and formatting. Instead, use a proper logging utility like log4j or slf4j. This allows you to easily control the log level, format, and output location.

System.out.println statements are not suitable for production code. They are not flexible in terms of output and formatting. Instead, use a proper logging utility like log4j or slf4j. This allows you to easily control the log level, format, and output location.
